tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ARContentMetadata (
    ar_content_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    ar_content_name VARCHAR(255),
    ar_content_description TEXT,
    ar_content_path VARCHAR(255),
    ar_content_type VARCHAR(50),
    ar_content_size INT
);

CREATE TABLE ARContentMetadata (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT,
    author VARCHAR(100),
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE ARContentImages (
    image_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    content_id INT,
    image_url TEXT,
    caption VARCHAR(255),
    FOREIGN KEY (content_id) REFERENCES ARContentMetadata(id)
);

CREATE TABLE ar_content (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    content_name VARCHAR(255),
    content_description TEXT,
    content_type VARCHAR(50),
    uploaded_date TIMESTAMP,
    file_path VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE ar_assets (
    asset_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    asset_name VARCHAR(255),
    asset_type VARCHAR(50),
    asset_size INT,
    asset_format VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE ar_likes (
    like_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    content_id INT,
    like_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES ar_users(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (content_id) REFERENCES ar_content(id)
);
